item.description:
Sunday is looking to be a Great weather ski day, with some sun and in the 20s. Time to get out to Windblown for their wonderful 2-3 foot depth packed powder, powder trails

http://windblownxc.com/ 

Meet at Windblown touring center for a nice casual fun Novice to Intermediate ski

11:45AM INSIDE / around the Windblown ticket counter

weekend Adult Trail Pass, $17

Rental Equipment Available, classic skis-boots- poles, $18

Bring plenty of Water and snacks for the trail.

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Windblown Sunday afternoon casual ski
